languages.text: Ирлиэт просит элантаха помочь сородичам, угодившим в капкан судьбы. Эльдары измучены и слабы — их песнь есть крик отчаяния. Угасающий крик.

traits.locale_text: Эти эльдары напуганы и слабы, их угрозы — не более, чем крик отчаяния. Бежав с Крудараха и надеясь спастись, они оказались в плену судьбы и теперь не имеют возможности выбраться из чудовищной ловушки. Ирлиэт обращается к Вольному Торговцу с просьбой помочь ее сородичам, запертым среди мин в разрушенном корабле.

languages.text: Yrliet is asking the elantach to help her kin who have found themselves trapped in a snare of fate. The Aeldari are enervated and weak, and their song is a cry of despair. A cry that is fading.
languages.original_text: Ирлиэт просит элантаха помочь сородичам, угодившим в капкан судьбы. Эльдары измучены и слабы — их песнь есть крик отчаяния. Угасающий крик.

traits.locale_text: These Aeldari are weakened and frightened, and their threats are nothing more than a desperate act. After fleeing Crudarach to save their lives, they ended up in this horrible deathtrap with no means to escape. Yrliet asks the Rogue Trader to help her kin trapped amid the minefield in their wrecked voidship.
Yrliet is asking the elantach to help her kin who have found themselves trapped in a snare of fate. The Aeldari are enervated and weak, and their song is a cry of despair. A cry that is fading.
Yrliet is asking the elantach to help her kin who have found themselves trapped in a snare of fate. The Aeldari are enervated and weak, and their song is a cry of despair. A cry that is fading.
Yrliet is asking the elantach to help her kin who have found themselves trapped in a snare of fate. The Aeldari are enervated and weak, and their song is a cry of despair. A cry that is fading.

languages.text: Yrliet demande à l'elantach d'aider les membres de son peuple prisonniers d'un piège du destin. Les Aeldaris sont affaiblis et leur chant est un cri de désespoir. Un cri qui s'atténue.
languages.original_text: Yrliet is asking the elantach to help her kin who have found themselves trapped in a snare of fate. The Aeldari are enervated and weak, and their song is a cry of despair. A cry that is fading.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet demande à l'elantach d'aider les membres de son peuple prisonniers d'un piège du destin. Les Aeldaris sont affaiblis et leur chant est un cri de désespoir. Un cri qui s'atténue.

languages.text: ユリエットはエランタに、運命の罠に落ちたキンを助けてくれるよう頼んでいる。アエルダリは体力を奪われ、衰弱している。その歌は絶望の叫び…消えゆく叫びだ。
languages.original_text: Yrliet is asking the elantach to help her kin who have found themselves trapped in a snare of fate. The Aeldari are enervated and weak, and their song is a cry of despair. A cry that is fading.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットはエランタに、運命の罠に落ちたキンを助けてくれるよう頼んでいる。アエルダリは体力を奪われ、衰弱している。その歌は絶望の叫び…消えゆく叫びだ。

languages.text: 伊莉耶特希望外界人能帮助她的亲族。那些艾达灵族被困在了命运的陷阱之中，无力地发出了绝望的呼唤。他们的喊声仿佛绝望的歌声，声音越来越轻。
languages.original_text: Yrliet is asking the elantach to help her kin who have found themselves trapped in a snare of fate. The Aeldari are enervated and weak, and their song is a cry of despair. A cry that is fading.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特希望外界人能帮助她的亲族。那些艾达灵族被困在了命运的陷阱之中，无力地发出了绝望的呼唤。他们的喊声仿佛绝望的歌声，声音越来越轻。

languages.text: Yrliet pide a los elantach que ayuden a sus parientes, atrapados en una trampa del destino. Los Aeldari están enervados y débiles, y su canto es un grito de desesperación, un grito que se desvanece.
languages.original_text: Yrliet is asking the elantach to help her kin who have found themselves trapped in a snare of fate. The Aeldari are enervated and weak, and their song is a cry of despair. A cry that is fading.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet pide a los elantach que ayuden a sus parientes, atrapados en una trampa del destino. Los Aeldari están enervados y débiles, y su canto es un grito de desesperación, un grito que se desvanece.

languages.text: Yrliet bittet den Elantach, ihren Verwandten zu helfen, die in eine Falle des Schicksals getappt sind. Die Aeldari sind entkräftet und geschwächt, ihr Lied ist ein verzweifelter Schrei. Ein Schrei, der immer leiser wird.
languages.original_text: Yrliet is asking the elantach to help her kin who have found themselves trapped in a snare of fate. The Aeldari are enervated and weak, and their song is a cry of despair. A cry that is fading.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet bittet den Elantach, ihren Verwandten zu helfen, die in eine Falle des Schicksals getappt sind. Die Aeldari sind entkräftet und geschwächt, ihr Lied ist ein verzweifelter Schrei. Ein Schrei, der immer leiser wird.
